propertyDefinition.label: Header Parameter Name:Value List
propertyDefinition.description: Header parameter comma separate list of Name:Value pairs

propertyDefinition.label: Use Token
propertyDefinition.description: Use token received from authentication step for subsequent requests to server

propertyDefinition.label: Token URL
propertyDefinition.description: URL to authenticate and get token

propertyDefinition.label: Skip Header Rows
propertyDefinition.description: Enter number of header rows to skip when receiving the data
